languages.text:
The cyber-mastiff gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}. Its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by +50%, and it deals +300% more damage.
The {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}apprehending{/g} cyber-mastiff attacks the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} target whenever any ally that is not its Overseer successfully attacks it up to {uip|Count|a07bc75d755f4a7cab924d138fa23298} times per round.
Whenever the cyber-mastiff kills an enemy for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the cyber-mastiff regains 20% of its maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

The cyber-mastiff gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}. Its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by +50%, and it deals +300% more damage.

languages.original_text:
Кибермастиф получает +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}, +50% к {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимальному здоровью{/g} и +300% к наносимому урону.
Кибермастиф, выполняющий {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}захват{/g}, атакует {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}цель захвата{/g}, когда ее успешно атакует любой его союзник.
Убив противника впервые за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, кибермастиф восстанавливает 20% от максимального {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
The cyber-mastiff gains +20 Weapon Skill and Strength. Its maximum wounds are increased by +100%, and it deals +300% more damage.
The {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}apprehending{/g} cyber-mastiff attacks the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} target, whenever any ally successfully attacks it.
Whenever the cyber-mastiff kills an enemy for the first time in a round, the cyber-mastiff regains 20% of its maximum wounds.

The cyber-mastiff gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}. Its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by +50%, and it deals +300% more damage.
The {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}apprehending{/g} cyber-mastiff attacks the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} target whenever an ally (other than the Overseer) successfully attacks it for the first {uip|Count|a07bc75d755f4a7cab924d138fa23298} times in a round.
Whenever the cyber-mastiff kills an enemy for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the cyber-mastiff regains 20% of its maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

The cyber-mastiff gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}. Its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by +50%, and it deals +300% more damage.
The {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}apprehending{/g} cyber-mastiff attacks the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} target whenever an ally (other than the Overseer) successfully attacks it for the first {uip|Count|a07bc75d755f4a7cab924d138fa23298} times in a round.
Whenever the cyber-mastiff kills an enemy for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the cyber-mastiff regains 20% of its maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

languages.text:
Siber mastif, +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g} niteliği kazanır. {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}Maksimum sağlık{/g} puanı +%50 artar ve +%300 daha fazla hasar verir.
({g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g} haricindeki) bir dost birim, bir rauntta ilk {uip|Count|a07bc75d755f4a7cab924d138fa23298} kez {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}göz hapsindeki{/g} hedefe başarıyla saldırdığında {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}göz hapsine alan{/g} siber mastif de aynı hedefe saldırır.
Siber mastif, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} içinde ilk kez bir düşmanı öldürdüğünde maksimum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanının %20'sini geri kazanır.

(Gözetmen haricindeki) bir dost birim, bir rauntta ilk {uip|Count|a07bc75d755f4a7cab924d138fa23298} kez {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}göz hapsindeki{/g} hedefe başarıyla saldırdığında {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}göz hapsine alan{/g} siber mastif de aynı hedefe saldırır.
Siber mastif, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} içinde ilk kez bir düşmanı öldürdüğünde maksimum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanının %20'sini geri kazanır.

({g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g} haricindeki) bir dost birim, bir rauntta ilk {uip|Count|a07bc75d755f4a7cab924d138fa23298} kez {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}göz hapsindeki{/g} hedefe başarıyla saldırdığında {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}göz hapsine alan{/g} siber mastif de aynı hedefe saldırır.

languages.text:
El cibermastín recibe +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}. Sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} aumentan en un +50 % e inflige un +300 % de daño adicional.
Mientras el cibermastín esté {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}apresando{/g} a un objetivo, atacará al objetivo {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apresado{/g} siempre que un aliado (que no sea el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g}) lo ataque con éxito, hasta {uip|Count|a07bc75d755f4a7cab924d138fa23298} veces por asalto.
Cada vez que el cibermastín mata a un enemigo por primera vez en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, recupera un 20 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} máximas.

Cada vez que el cibermastín mata a un enemigo por primera vez en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, recupera un 20 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} máximas.

languages.text:
生化獒犬的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}提高20点，{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}提高50%，造成的伤害提高300%。
每当其他盟友（{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}本人除外）每轮中的前{uip|Count|a07bc75d755f4a7cab924d138fa23298}次攻击命中被{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕获{/g}的敌人时，{g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}实施逮捕{/g}的生化獒犬都会对其进行攻击。
当生化獒犬每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中首次击杀敌人时，恢复最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的20%。

languages.text:
Der Cyber-Mastiff erhält +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}. Seine {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} werden um +50 % erhöht, und er verursacht +300 % mehr Schaden.
Der {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}fassende{/g} Cyber-Mastiff greift das {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}gefasste{/g} Ziel an, wenn ein Verbündeter (Außer dem {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g}) es dir ersten {uip|Count|a07bc75d755f4a7cab924d138fa23298} Male in einer Runde erfolgreich angreift.
Wenn der Cyber-Mastiff zum ersten Mal in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} einen Gegner tötet, erhält der Cyber-Mastiff 20 % seiner maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}.

The {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}apprehending{/g} cyber-mastiff attacks the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} target whenever an ally (other than the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}) successfully attacks it for the first {uip|Count|a07bc75d755f4a7cab924d138fa23298} times in a round.

Der Cyber-Mastiff erhält +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}. Seine {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} werden um +50 % erhöht, und er verursacht +300 % mehr Schaden.
Der {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}fassende{/g} Cyber-Mastiff greift das {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}gefasste{/g} Ziel an, wenn ein Verbündeter (Außer dem Aufseher) es dir ersten {uip|Count|a07bc75d755f4a7cab924d138fa23298} Male in einer Runde erfolgreich angreift.
Wenn der Cyber-Mastiff zum ersten Mal in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} einen Gegner tötet, erhält der Cyber-Mastiff 20 % seiner maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}.

languages.text:
Le cyber-mastiff reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} de +20. Ses {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} sont augmentées de +50 %, et il inflige +300 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Le cyber-mastiff {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}procédant à l'appréhension{/g} attaque la cible {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}appréhendée{/g} chaque fois qu'un allié (autre que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g}) réussit à l'attaquer pour les {uip|Count|a07bc75d755f4a7cab924d138fa23298} fois lors d'un round.
Chaque fois que le cyber-mastiff tue un ennemi pour la première fois au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, il récupère 20 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-mastiff gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}. Its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by +50%, and it deals +300% more damage.
The {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}apprehending{/g} cyber-mastiff attacks the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} target whenever an ally (other than the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}) successfully attacks it for the first {uip|Count|a07bc75d755f4a7cab924d138fa23298} times in a round.
Whenever the cyber-mastiff kills an enemy for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the cyber-mastiff regains 20% of its maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Le cyber-mastiff reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} de +20. Ses {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} sont augmentées de +50 %, et il inflige +300 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Le cyber-mastiff {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}procédant à l'appréhension{/g} attaque la cible {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}appréhendée{/g} chaque fois qu'un allié (autre que le surveillant) réussit à l'attaquer pour les {uip|Count|a07bc75d755f4a7cab924d138fa23298} fois lors d'un round.
Chaque fois que le cyber-mastiff tue un ennemi pour la première fois au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, il récupère 20 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum.

Le cyber-mastiff reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} de +20. Ses {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} sont augmentées de +50 %, et il inflige +300 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Le cyber-mastiff {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}procédant à l'appréhension{/g} attaque la cible {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}appréhendée{/g} chaque fois qu'un allié (autre que le surveillant) réussit à l'attaquer pour les {uip|Count|a07bc75d755f4a7cab924d138fa23298} fois lors d'un round.
Chaque fois que le cyber-mastiff tue un ennemi pour la première fois au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, il récupère 20 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum.

Le cyber-mastiff reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} de +20. Ses {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} sont augmentées de +50 %, et il inflige +300 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Le cyber-mastiff {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}procédant à l'appréhension{/g} attaque la cible {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}appréhendée{/g} chaque fois qu'un allié (autre que le surveillant) réussit à l'attaquer pour les {uip|Count|a07bc75d755f4a7cab924d138fa23298} fois lors d'un round.
Chaque fois que le cyber-mastiff tue un ennemi pour la première fois au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, il récupère 20 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum.

languages.text:
サイバーマスチフの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}が+20される。{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}が+50%増加し、与えるダメージが+300%される。
{g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}捕縛している{/g}のサイバーマスチフは、味方（{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}を除く）がラウンドで{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕縛された{/g}ターゲットを攻撃して成功した最初の{uip|Count|a07bc75d755f4a7cab924d138fa23298}回ごとに、そのターゲットを攻撃する。
サイバーマスチフが{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で敵を初めて倒すと、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}の20%を回復する。
languages.original_text:
The cyber-mastiff gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}. Its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by +50%, and it deals +300% more damage.
The {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}apprehending{/g} cyber-mastiff attacks the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} target whenever an ally (other than the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}) successfully attacks it for the first {uip|Count|a07bc75d755f4a7cab924d138fa23298} times in a round.
Whenever the cyber-mastiff kills an enemy for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the cyber-mastiff regains 20% of its maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
サイバーマスチフの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}が+20される。{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}が+50%増加し、与えるダメージが+300%される。
{g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}捕縛している{/g}のサイバーマスチフは、味方（監督官を除く）がラウンドで{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕縛された{/g}ターゲットを攻撃して成功した最初の{uip|Count|a07bc75d755f4a7cab924d138fa23298}回ごとに、そのターゲットを攻撃する。
サイバーマスチフが{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で敵を初めて倒すと、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}の20%を回復する。

サイバーマスチフの武器スキルと腕力が+20される。最大の傷が+50%増加し、与えるダメージが+300%される。
{g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}捕縛している{/g}サイバーマスチフは、味方が{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕縛された{/g}ターゲットの攻撃に成功するたびに、捕縛されたターゲットを攻撃する。
サイバーマスチフがラウンドで初めて敵を倒すと、そのサイバーマスチフは最大の傷の20%を回復する。

サイバーマスチフの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}が+20される。{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}が+50%増加し、与えるダメージが+300%される。
{g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}捕縛している{/g}のサイバーマスチフは、味方（監督官を除く）がラウンドで{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕縛された{/g}ターゲットを攻撃して成功した最初の{uip|Count|a07bc75d755f4a7cab924d138fa23298}回ごとに、そのターゲットを攻撃する。
サイバーマスチフが{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で敵を初めて倒すと、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}の20%を回復する。

languages.text:
Кибермастиф получает +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}, +50% к {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимальному здоровью{/g} и наносит на 300% больше урона.
Кибермастиф, выполняющий {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}захват{/g}, атакует {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}цель захвата{/g}, когда ее успешно атакует любой его союзник первые {uip|Count|a07bc75d755f4a7cab924d138fa23298} раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
Убив противника впервые за раунд, кибермастиф восстанавливает 20% от максимального {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-mastiff gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}. Its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by +50%, and it deals +300% more damage.
The {g|f:e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}apprehending{/g} cyber-mastiff attacks the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} target whenever an ally (other than the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}) successfully attacks it for the first {uip|Count|a07bc75d755f4a7cab924d138fa23298} times in a round.
Whenever the cyber-mastiff kills an enemy for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the cyber-mastiff regains 20% of its maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
